text: Boyko Metodiev Borisov (born 13 June 1959) was the Prime minister of Bulgaria. He previously served as prime minister from 2009 to 2013. He was succeeded by Marin Raykov. Before he was prime minister, Borisov was mayor of Sofia, the capital of Bulgaria. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors Category:Prime Ministers of Bulgaria
title: Boyko Borisov
